mapper.select: select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from company a where cname like '%${find}%') b where b.rn between (${pageIndex}*${pageSize}+1) and (${pageIndex} * ${pageSize}+${pageSize})
mapper.update: update company set Cname=#{cname, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , Cdescription=#{cdescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , Caddress=#{caddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , Ctel=#{ctel, jdbcType=INTEGER} , Cpasswd=#{cpasswd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cid=#{cid, jdbcType=INTEGER}
